cleaned_text: September 16, 2022 [Is bHRT For You?](https://thenewknew.com/what-is-bhrt/) Struggling through perimenopause? Wondering if (bioidentical hormone replacement therapy) is for you? Wondering if bHRT (bioidentical hormone replacement therapy) is for you? The TNK team has gotten a lot of IG queries about if bHRT is "safe" and what... May 13, 2022 Vulnerable post alert. Maybe you are like me and when you have a second to read, you want to make it WORTH IT! I am always trying to get it...
